Package io.atomix.copycat.client

Fully-featured Copycat client for interacting with replicated state machines.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionStrategy
    Connection strategies define how clients should handle initializing connections to the cluster.
    ConnectionStrategy.Attempt
    Represents a failed attempt at connecting to the server.
    CopycatClient
    Provides an interface for submitting commands and Query queries to the Copycat cluster.
    RecoveryStrategy
    Strategy for recovering client sessions on failures.
    ServerSelectionStrategy
    Strategy for selecting nodes to which to connect and submit operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CopycatClient.Builder
    Builds a new Copycat client.
    DefaultCopycatClient
    Default Copycat client implementation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectionStrategies
    Strategies for handling client connection failures.
    CopycatClient.State
    Indicates the state of the client's communication with the Copycat cluster.
    RecoveryStrategies
    Strategies for recovering lost client sessions.
    ServerSelectionStrategies
    Strategies for managing how clients connect to and communicate with the cluster.

Package io.atomix.copycat.client Description

Fully-featured Copycat client for interacting with replicated state machines.

The client is a fully featured client that facilitates submitting commands and queries to a Copycat cluster. Clients communicate with the cluster within the context of a session. To create a client and connect to the cluster, use the CopycatClient.Builder. 

   
   CopycatClient client = CopycatClient.builder(servers)
     .withTransport(new NettyTransport())
     .build();
   client.open().join();
Clients are designed to communicate with any server in the cluster in a transparent manner. See the CopycatClient documentation for more information.
Author:
Jordan Halterman
